Pengamat Nilai Sosok Darmizal Pantas jadi Anggota Watimpres
06 Nov 2019, 12:31 by Syarif Hasan Salampessy


Pengamat Nilai Sosok Darmizal Pantas jadi Anggota Watimpres

KBRN, Jakarta: Melengkapi potensi kekurangan pada anggota Kabinet Indonesia Maju itu, posisi Dewan Pertimbangan Presiden atau Watimpres dinilai sangat krusial dan penting guna memberi masukkan yang bijak sekaligus produktif kepada Presiden Jokowi. 
Pengamat politik dari Universitas Nasional (Unas) Jakarta Saiful Anam menyatakan komitmen untuk membuat Indonesia Maju lebih utama dibandingkan kepentingan pribadi maupun golongannya. 
Karena itu, lanjut Saiful Anam, orang-orang yang bakal mengisi posisi Watimpres harus punya kredibilitas, kapasitas dibidangnya masing-masing. Sehingga rekomendasi Watimpres nantinya benar-benar didengar oleh Presiden.
"Presiden harus bijak dan juga berhati-hati dalam memilih tokoh yang akan duduk sebagai Watimpres," ujar Saiful Anam kepada wartawan di Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Dosen Fakultas Hukum Unas ini menambahkan, Watimpres bertugas memberikan nasihat dan pertimbangan kepada Presiden dalam menjalankan kekuasaan pemerintahan. 
"Sesuai UU Nomor 19 tahun 2006 tentang Watimpres, pengangkatan anggota Watimpres sepenuhnya menjadi hak prerogratif Presiden dan anggota Watimpres diangkat paling lama 3 bulan setelah presiden dilantik," ujar Saiful Anam.
Dijelaskan pria kelahiran Semarang, Jawa Tengah ini, Ketua umum Relawan Jokowi alias ReJO HM Darmizal memiliki chemistri kuat dengan karakter Jokowi karna punya latar belakang yang sulit dimasa kecilnya. Darmizal, juga punya jaringan yang luas serta sama-sama alumni UGM Yogyakarta. 
"Jadi, Darmizal pantas dipilih Presiden Jokowi sebagai salah satu dari 9 orang anggota Watimpres," tambah Saiful Anam.
Jika melihat pesan yang termaktup pada UU Nomor 19 Tahun 2006 itu, saya memandang, Ketua umum RèJO Darmizal pantas duduk sebagai anggota Watimpres itu. Dia itu berkeringat bahkan berdarah-darah, loyalitas yang tinggi pada pimpinan dan garis perjuangan yang diyakininya.
"Saya kira pak Darmizal adalah figur yang memenuhi kriteria sesuai UU tersebut. Jadi tepat sekali jika Presiden mempercayai dan menempatkan tokoh Minang yang satu ini sebagai anggota Watimpres," pungkas Saiful Anam.
Di tempat terpisah, Darmizal menjelaskan, pihaknya harus ikutserta mengawal Presiden Jokowi dan Wapres KH. Ma'ruf Amin untuk mengisi pembangunan Indonesia.
"Insya allah, diskusi publik #JakartaNext, adalah satu bentuk kecil peran serta kami. Karena masyarakat luas mesti lebih memahami setelah Jakarta tidak lagi jadi ibu kota Indonesia," jelas Darmizal.
Tak lupa, tokoh Minang ini mengucapkan terimakasih yang seluas-luasnya kepada Saiful Anam karena telah melihat saya dan RèJO dari sudut pandangnya sebagai pengamat politik nasional. 
"Namun, kami menyadari sepenuhnya, bahwa segala yang terkait hak prerogatif Presiden tidak dapat di intervensi oleh siapapun. Bagi kami, berjuang menjadi relawan Jokowi adalah panggilan hati nurani yang tidak bisa diintervensi siapapun. Bahwa yang kami lakukan, dilihat atau tidak oleh pak Jokowi, kami tidak pernah membahasnya," pungkas Darmizal.

Observers Value Figure Darmizal Worthy of being a Member of Watimpres
06 Nov 2019, 12:31 by Syarif Hasan Salampessy


Observers Value Figure Darmizal Worthy of being a Member of Watimpres

KBRN, Jakarta: Complementing the potential shortcomings of the members of the Advanced Indonesian Cabinet, the position of the Presidential Advisory Council or the Vice President is considered very crucial and important in order to give wise and productive input to President Jokowi.
Political observer from the National University (Unas) of Jakarta Saiful Anam expressed his commitment to make Indonesia Advance more important than personal or group interests.
Therefore, continued Saiful Anam, people who would fill the position of Watimpres must have credibility, capacity in their respective fields. So that Watimpres's recommendations will actually be heard by the President.
"The president must be wise and also careful in choosing figures who will sit as Vice President," Saiful Anam told reporters in Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019).
This Unas Faculty of Law lecturer added, Watimpres was tasked with giving advice and consideration to the President in carrying out governmental power.
"In accordance with Law Number 19 of 2006 concerning Watimpres, the appointment of Watimpres members is fully the prerogative right of the President and Watimpres members are appointed no later than 3 months after the president is appointed," said Saiful Anam.
Described the man born in Semarang, Central Java, the Chairperson of Jokowi Volunteer aka ReJO HM Darmizal has a strong chemistry with Jokowi's character because he has a difficult background in his childhood. Darmizal, also has an extensive network as well as UGM Yogyakarta alumni.
"So, Darmizal deserves to be elected by President Jokowi as one of the 9 members of Watimpres," Saiful Anam added.
If I look at the message contained in Law Number 19 of 2006, I see, the General Chairman of RèJO Darmizal deserves to sit as a member of the Watimpres. He was sweating even bloody, high loyalty to the leadership and the line of struggle that he believed.
"I think Mr. Darmizal is a figure who meets the criteria according to the Act. So it is very appropriate if the President believes and puts this Minang figure as a member of Watimpres," concluded Saiful Anam.
In a separate place, Darmizal explained, he must participate in escorting President Jokowi and Vice President KH. Ma'ruf Amin to fill Indonesia's development.
"God willing, public discussion #JakartaNext, is a small form of our participation. Because the wider community must understand more after Jakarta is no longer the capital of Indonesia," explained Darmizal.
Not to forget, this Minang figure would like to thank Saiful Anam as much as he can for seeing me and RèJO from his perspective as observers of national politics.
"However, we are fully aware that everything related to the President's prerogative rights cannot be intervened by anyone. For us, striving to become a Jokowi volunteer is a call of conscience that cannot be intervened by anyone. That what we do, see or not by Mr. Jokowi, we never discussed it, "concluded Darmizal.
